title: Lilies of the Field - 1964 Original Soundtrack (Mono FLAC - Jerr
description:
Lilies of the Field - 1964 Original Soundtrack (Mono FLAC - Jerry Goldsmith) (2012 edition)

Here's the Original Soundtrack to that famous 1963 Sydney Poitier movie, "Lilies of the Field".
Music by Jerry Goldsmith, vocals sung by Jester Hairston, composer of "Mary's Boy Child".  Sydney Poitier is famously tone deaf lol.  He's currently Ambassador of the Bahamas to Japan.

Great music, really like it.  I found this in my travels, didn't even know it existed, very hard to find.  This is the "2012 edition",  FLAC files, Monophonic.  I couldn't find any uploads of the stereo version, there was a stereo album made.  I've include pics of a stereo album with all the track titles, also a movie poster and a bunch of info pages for good measure.

Credit goes to the original ripper. Enjoy, and remember to seed! (my bandwidth costs me.....:^)
